index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF CONSTRUCTION AND LAND USE
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to environmental review of private projects; amending Section 18 of the Seattle SEPA Ordinance (105735); amending those portions of the Seattle SEPA Ordinance dealing with fees for environment impact statements prepared by or under the supervision of the Department of Construction and Land Use and referring to the fees established in the Department of Construction and Land Use Permit Fee Ordinance.
